L. Van Gool

dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset is used for semantic segmentation tasks, providing a benchmark with 21 categories including one background class.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: Bharath Hariharan
Pablo Arbel√°ez
Lubomir Bourdev

dcterms:description: This dataset consists of augmented training images derived from the PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset, specifically designed to enhance model training.
dcterms:title: Augmented 10,528 training images (from PASCAL VOC 2012)

dcterms:creator: Jiwoon Ahn
Suha Kwak
dcterms:description: This dataset includes 1,464 examples from the PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset, used for evaluating response maps in weakly-supervised semantic segmentation.
dcterms:title: 1,464 examples (from PASCAL VOC 2012)

dcterms:creator: Jiwoon Ahn
Suha Kwak
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of 1,449 images from the PASCAL VOC 2012 validation set, used for comparing segmentation results with other methods.
dcterms:title: 1,449 images (from PASCAL VOC 2012 validation set)

dcterms:creator: Jia Deng
Wei Dong
Richard Socher
Li-Jia Li
Kai Li
Li Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large-scale hierarchical image database used for training deep learning models, particularly in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: ImageNet
